channel.title: Comments on: Swing and a miss
channel.description: Call of Duty: Black Ops Cold War is a first-person shooter video game developed by Treyarch and Raven Software and published by Activision. r/BlackOpsColdWar is a developer-recognized community focused on the title.

item.title: By: Leeman500
item.dc:creator: Leeman500
item.description: I really don't see the point of having Launchers in the game if people have to use them as Melee weapons just for camo challenges.
item.content:encoded: I really don’t see the point of having Launchers in the game if people have to use them as Melee weapons just for camo challenges.

item.title: By: Yellowtoblerone
item.dc:creator: Yellowtoblerone
item.description: Btw why are you grinding for dmu if you already got da?
item.content:encoded: Btw why are you grinding for dmu if you already got da?
